thread.title: Victoria Beckham & James Corden Sing 'Spice Up Your Life' in 'Mannequin'-Themed 'Carpool Karaoke' Preview (Video)
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham & James Corden Sing 'Spice Up Your Life' in 'Mannequin'-Themed 'Carpool Karaoke' Preview (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Victoria Beckham & James Corden Sing 'Spice Up Your Life' in 'Mannequin'-Themed 'Carpool Karaoke' Preview (Video)
text:
Victoria Beckham transforms into a mannequin and brings it back to her Spice Girls days in this new preview for her upcoming Carpool Karaoke segment!
The 42-year-old fashion designer along with Late Late Show host James Corden paid tribute to the 1987 film Mannequin before showing off their vocal cords in the preview clip that premiered on Thursday (March 30).
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Vicoria Beckham 
“He was a talk show host and she was a mannequin who turned his world upside-down,” the clip begins.
Watch the fun teaser below!
And ICYMI, watch James fire fruit at Victoria , Jessica Chastain , and Lisa Kudrow in a recent sketch .

Mannequin starring Victoria Beckham & James Corden
